short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: RZAM helps you browse the web safely by blocking Malicious sites. Developed by Dubai Electronic Security Center

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Browse the web safely and protect yourself when visiting unsafe websites
with the help of RZAM developed by the The Dubai Electronic Security Center (DESC).

The Dubai Electronic Security Center (DESC) is the official government department entrusted to make Dubai the safest city in cyber space.

RZAM is a Web extension for your Browser.

RZAM works with your browser to block malicious sites from loading using  content blocking technology and the RZAMâ€™s AI engine.
 
FEATURES:

- RZAM website scanning engine : Using AI/ML we scan websites to detect any Malicious activity taking place on the URL.

- Content blocking technology - Using content blockers we block malicious sites from loading any malicious scripts , API requests , images etc.

RZAM is a trademark of Dubai Electronic Security Center , registered in the U.A.E
